::Hot Rod::

"Thats understandable. It must have been..." He stoped, not wanting to
stir up bad memorys, any farther.
"So what do we do now?" He really didn't know, the situation was acword.
He droped his hands down, so they rested on her hips.
He kissed her, putting all the feeling he could into it.
